text:
Cyndx Networks | Full Time, Onsite | Devops, Backend, Frontend At Cyndx Networks we're re-thinking the Capital raising process using a data-driven model to both recommend investors for companies as well as reach out to them and power your fundraise.

Our clients range from Huge Investment Banks (You've heard of them) to growth stage startups that you may already not know or have yet to hear of.

We operate with a completely flat structure, where independence and automony is the norm. We take an open and collaborative approach to solving massive problems. Everyone has a voice.

We truly care about work/life balance. You wonâ€™t be chained to your desk. We are a Slack driven culture, no emails (except for your lunch orders), or useless meetings. We have a very unique opportunity to tackle the massive industry of investment banking.

If this sounds interesting shoot us an email to jobs@cyndx.net

Devops: http://www.builtinla.com/job/devops-engineer-50
